name: William the Navigator
description:
Controls :

ZQSD / WASD : Navigation
L-Shift / Space : Aim (click to shoot)
Mouse : everything else

Crewmembers have an influence on speed, autorepair and fire rate.

Web version here (not recommended : slower game & less AI ships)

Made in GameMaker in 10 days.

v1.1 : added cheat codes
